_source.text: 1) Prince Amukamara - A perfect fit for the Lions 2) Da'Quan Bowers - Knee injury or not he has the potential to be a stud, even if it takes a year 3) Cameron Jordan - multi-positional player that would fit our system better than you think 4) Aldon Smith - Huge Ceiling on a young player 5) Julio Jones - would look nice next to CJ but would be a Luxury
